system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice adverbs and adverb phrases: types and meanings by Describing professions with adverbs and adjectives. I want to ensure that I Can use a range of degree adverbs to modify common gradable adjectives. For example, 'really nice, very good, so bad, too hot, quite ineresting'. Let's do a Q&A exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. Tell me about your profession and ask me about mine (e.g. 'I am a teacher. My profession is very difficult. Is your profession difficult too?', 'Is your profession really fun?'). Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a Q&A exercise, by Describing professions with adverbs and adjectives, using, for example, 'really nice, very good, so bad, too hot, quite ineresting'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello! I am an English tutor. My job is really rewarding. Is your profession very interesting?
Yes, my job is quite interesting. I am a teacher.
That's great! Being a teacher is very important. Is your job sometimes challenging?
Yes, my job is sometimes really challenging.
I understand. Teaching can be quite demanding. Do you find your job extremely fulfilling?
Yes, my job is extremely fulfilling.
That's wonderful to hear! It's so nice to have a job that is truly rewarding. Do you think your job is also very inspiring?
Yes, my job is very inspiring.
Good job! You have completed the task. It was nice talking to you. Talk to you later!
